title: Is copywriting without using graphic designing reliable? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m not sure what you’re asking. Do you mean… Can copy perform well without graphic design? If that’s your question, my answer is yes and no. Short marketing emails don’t need graphic design. In fact, just plain text emails can work really well. However, longer copy — such as landing pages and direct mail pieces — NEED a graphic designer to work their magic. Without design, you would end up with a block of text that’s hard to read. And, if people won’t read your copy, you won’t get any sales. Besides, adding pictures and graphs that support the copy can increase response.
Yes it can be for sure BUT…. Images, videos and graphics really add another level of conversion value to the funnel. I usually always recommend supporting media with powerful copy.
